title: Where can I share my article's links? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are several options but I will just list some You can join relevant forums by searching your topic/niche +forum on Google. Make sure you make meaningful contributions as well. Search fpr questions to suit your topic within the forum and share your link as the answer.Join relevant Social media groups and make useful contributions before sharing your link. Don't spam.Add quotes from influencers in your niche to your article or mention influencers with links in your article then send them an email telling them about the article. They will definitely love to share with their audience and they usually have a large audience. You can identify influencers using www.buzzsumo.com by searching for your keyword and checking the influencer tab.There are many more such as blog commenting, article sharing sites, web 2.0 sharing sites just focus on few and be consistent.If you need more help you can contact me.
Depends of the topics. You should find interested parties online and share with them, so that they are interested and it would not be spammy and annoying.
